channel.title: Diary on SCIENCE | ART
channel.description: Recent content in Diary on SCIENCE | ART

item.title: The Intense Competition in Competitive Programming
item.description: In the 436th LeetCode Weekly Contest, nine out of the top ten participants are from China, with only one participant (9th place, uwi, from Japan) from another country. I can only imagine how desperate foreign coders must feel, lol. Now I understand why so many brilliant scientists and engineers are leaving this country—it’s simply too competitive. Only the smartest and most energetic individuals survive.
